thread.title: Ciara bares her baby bump in intimate topless shoot with Russell Wilson and son Future
thread.title_full: Ciara bares her baby bump in intimate topless shoot with Russell Wilson and son Future

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Ciara bares her baby bump in intimate topless shoot with Russell Wilson and son Future
text:
Ciara bares her baby bump in intimate topless shoot with Russell Wilson and son Future The 31-year-old singer is expecting her second child with the sportsman Share Ciara bares her bump for Harper's Bazaar (Photo: ciara/Instagram) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ciara has shared a series of candid shots from her photoshoot with Harper’s Bazaar. 
In one snap, the pregnant singer, 31, is flaunting her huge belly as she cradles her two-year-old son Future who she has with her rapper ex. 
Her husband Russell Wilson is standing behind her while holding onto his wife’s belly with two hands. 
“Just the 4 of us,” she wrote alongside the intimate portrait which appears in the latest issue of the glossy magazine. Instagram 
While most people praised the “beautiful” picture in the comments section, others accused her of doing it to get back at her ex Future. 
One wrote: "Ok let me break it down for y'all if you ladies ex man had a wife who was pregnant would you think it be ok for your child to be in a picture naked with them and post it on social media is more my point would you be ok with that ladies." (Photo: Charlie Steffens/WENN) (Photo: PA) 
Another also said she was just trying to copy pregnant Beyonce, who recently showed off her bare belly in a series of stylish photographs. 
"This woman has issues," they fumed. "She is trying to get back at Future. She's nothing but a COPY CAT...BEYONCE WANNA BE. Best she has ever lived.” Ciara and ex Future (Photo: WireImage) Ciara (Photo: Rex Features)
